title.rendered: With Handshake, Vanguard Takes Luck Out of the Student Job Search

content.rendered: Students and recent grads accounted for 50% of Vanguard’s tech hiring last year. Hear from Global Chief Information Officer John T. Marcante and Principal, Head of Intermediary Technology Kristie Edling-Day for how the company teams up with Handshake to extend a “no luck required” investing philosophy into hiring practices.

excerpt.rendered: With Handshake, Vanguard takes connections, experience, and luck out of the recruiting process to make jobs accessible to all.
